detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text print on the front. Jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Ankle-length treggings in sturdy jersey with fine details. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Textured-weave blouse in a narrow cut at the front with a gathered collar with an opening and drawstring at the top. Long raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool. Wide neckline, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and two-way zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, concealed side pockets and an inner pocket. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-knit details, a racer back and elasticated hem. Light support. Seamless.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Joggers in jersey with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed side panels and a kangaroo pocket. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Slim Fit.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in a textured linen and cotton weave with an elasticated waist, patch side pockets and adjustable straps that cross and fasten with concealed buttons at the back. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in cotton jersey made partly from organic cotton. Regular fit.

Cold shoulder blouse in crinkled plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester with narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps. Lace-trimmed flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders and down the front, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit gloves with touchscreen-compatible material on the thumb, index and middle finger.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in soft, stretch twill with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
V-neck jumper knitted in a wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short V-neck dress in lace with a concealed zip at the back, long, straight sleeves and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Hairbands in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.

prod_name: SB Fredrik wool top base layer
detail_desc: Base layer top in soft wool jersey with long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Round glasses with plastic frames.
Knee-length, A-line dress in sturdy slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a square neckline and elastication around the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the hems. Unlined.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with a slit and buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, an inner pocket and a straight-cut hem. Lined.
Captain’s cap in twill made from a cotton blend with a braided cord. Lined.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with unlined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated straps that cross at the front and no fasteners. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, textured cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Glittery metal hair clips in various designs. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat in braided straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 9 cm. Unlined.
Vest top in ribbed jersey with decorative lace around the neckline and armholes.
Short-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey.
Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a peplum. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in different colours of stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets with a frill trim on one pair, and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a crêpe weave with narrow, frilled shoulder straps and short sleeves. Frill-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Vest top in soft jersey with a yoke at the front.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a round neckline and buttons at the top.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a soft shaft and zip at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heels 8 cm.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Straw hat with a wide grosgrain band. Width of brim 7 cm.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed, velvety-smooth finish. Stand-up collar, drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Cap in cotton jersey with a text motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and tapered legs.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a collar, V-neck and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length joggers in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
